General.Name: Kosaya Gora Iron Works JSC
General.Description: Joint-Stock Company Kosaya Gora Iron Works manufactures and distributes blast furnace and foundry products, non-basic and secondary materials, and heat and electricity. The company's products include pig iron and ferromanganese; foundry product that include industrial casting, art casting, decorative, landscape, ritual, housing, and communal casting; secondary products include slag brick, granulated slag, blast-furnace slag, and crushed slag. The company also offers recycling of secondary materials, consultations on the implementation of the integrated dry gas purification systems of the blast furnace gas, industrial design, project development with the installation of variable frequency drives, further technical support of the project, development and implementation of industrial control automatic systems in blast furnace production. In addition provides consultations on complex issues of automation of blast furnaces and its separate sections, includes search for optimal solutions to increase the efficiency of the automatic control systems (ACS), consultations on equipment selection and process control instrumentation, a survey of systems and process control instrumentation to identify the reserves, and consultation on the implementation of technology of metallurgical briquettes production. The company was founded in 1897 and is based in Tula, Russia. As of July 26, 2019, Joint-Stock Company Kosaya Gora Iron Works operates as a subsidiary of AO SCHPZ.
